LNG_ROLE_AVAILABLE_PERMISSIONS_BULK_MODI.translation: This permission allows modifying lab results in bulk

LNG_OUTBREAK_FIELD_LABEL_CHECK_LAST_CONT.translation: Display warning if date of last contact is before date of onset
An warning will be displayed if date of last contact is before date of onset. You will still be able to save data without having to address the warning

LNG_OUTBREAK_TEMPLATE_FIELD_LABEL_CHECK_.translation: Display warning if date of last contact is before date of onset
An warning will be displayed if date of last contact is before date of onset. You will still be able to save data without having to address the warning

LNG_OUTBREAK_FIELD_LABEL_DISABLE_MODIFYI.translation: By default when you modify a case that was converted from a contact you have the option to change both contact and case forms (the same applies for a contact converted from a case)

LNG_OUTBREAK_TEMPLATE_FIELD_LABEL_DISABL.translation: By default when you modify a case that was converted from a contact you have the option to change both contact and case forms (the same applies for a contact converted from a case)

LNG_PAGE_MODIFY_ENTITY_RELATIONSHIP_WARN.translation: Date of Last Contact is before Date of Onset ({{dateOfOnset}}) of the source case
Date of Last Contact is before Date of Onset ({{dateOfOnset}}) of the source case: {{entities}}

LNG_PAGE_CREATE_ENTITY_RELATIONSHIP_WARN.translation: Date of Last Contact is before Date of Onset ({{dateOfOnset}}) for the following contacts: {{entities}}
Date of Last Contact is before Date of Onset for the following exposures: {{entities}}

LNG_PAGE_CREATE_CONTACT_WARNING_LAST_CON.translation: Date of Last Contact is before Date of Onset ({{dateOfOnset}}) of the source case

LNG_PAGE_BULK_ADD_CONTACTS_ACTION_CREATE.translation: Date of Last Contact is before Date of Onset ({{dateOfOnset}}) for the following rows: {{rows}}

LNG_PAGE_LIST_CONTACTS_EXPORT_EXPOSURE_I.translation: Include information like event name or case firstname, last name, id

LNG_PAGE_LIST_CONTACTS_EXPORT_RETRIEVE_O.translation: By default on export the most recent exposure is exported along with contact information, but you can request to retrieve the oldest exposure instead

LNG_PAGE_LIST_CONTACTS_OF_CONTACTS_EXPOR.translation: Include information like contact firstname, last name, id
By default the most recent exposure is exported along with contact information. This flag allows you to retrieve the oldest exposure instead

LNG_HOSPITALISATION_ISOLATION_DATE_RANGE.translation: Date of onset is after start date

LNG_OUTBREAK_FIELD_CHECK_DUPLICATE_ENTIT.translation: Using the same ID mask for cases, contacts and / or contacts of contacts, will maintain continuity in the sequence number increase for all groups. The counter will not reset and therefore there will be no separate sequence increase order for cases, contacts, and / or contacts of contacts.

LNG_PAGE_TRANSMISSION_CHAIN_BARS_LEGEND_.translation:
{{rectCD}} Case details: hs - Hospitalized / is - Isolated
{{rectLAB}} Lab result details: L? - unknown result / L- - negative result / L+ - positive result / (p) - waiting for result
{{rectOUT}} Outcome: oa - Alive / od - Deceased / or - Recovered
{{rectB}} Burial: bn - Buried no safe / bs - Buried safe

LNG_CASE_FIELD_LABEL_DATE_OF_ONSET_IS_AF.translation: Date of onset is after date of reporting

LNG_PAGE_MODIFY_LAB_RESULT_LIST_MODIFY_D.translation: *The system will replace only data that is changed. If you don't enter any data, then the system won't update the data to any of the selected lab results

LNG_DIALOG_CONFIRM_DELETE_EVENT.translation: Deleting Event '{{name}}' will also delete any related records (e.g. relationships). Click Ok to continue

LNG_DIALOG_CONFIRM_RESTORE_EVENT.translation: Restoring Event '{{name}}' will also restore any related records that were deleted at the same time as the event (e.g. relationships). Click Ok to continue

LNG_DIALOG_CONFIRM_DELETE_CONTACT.translation: Deleting Contact '{{name}}' will also delete any related records (e.g. follow-ups, laboratory results, relationships). Click Ok to continue

LNG_DIALOG_CONFIRM_RESTORE_CONTACT.translation: Restoring Contact '{{name}}' will also restore any related records that were deleted at the same time as the contact (e.g. follow-ups, laboratory results, relationships). Click Ok to continue

LNG_DIALOG_CONFIRM_DELETE_CONTACT_OF_CON.translation: Deleting Contact of Contacts '{{name}}' will also delete any related records (e.g. follow-ups, laboratory results, relationships). Click Ok to continue

LNG_DIALOG_CONFIRM_RESTORE_CONTACT_OF_CO.translation: Restoring Contact of Contacts '{{name}}' will also restore any related records that were deleted at the same time as the contact of contacts (e.g. follow-ups, laboratory results, relationships). Click Ok to continue

LNG_DIALOG_CONFIRM_DELETE_CASE.translation: Deleting Case '{{name}}' will also delete any related records (e.g. follow-ups, laboratory results, relationships). Click Ok to continue

LNG_DIALOG_CONFIRM_DELETE_CASE_WITH_EXPO.translation: Case '{{name}}' has {{numberOfContacts}} exposed contacts that will be deleted. Any related records (e.g. follow-ups, laboratory results, relationships) will be deleted too. Click Ok to continue

LNG_DIALOG_CONFIRM_RESTORE_CASE.translation: Restoring Case '{{name}}' will also restore any related records that were deleted at the same time as the case (e.g. follow-ups, laboratory results, relationships). Click Ok to continue

LNG_CASE_LIST_SCREEN_NO_EVENTS.translation: There are no events to display

LNG_USER_LIST_SCREEN_NO_USERS.translation: There are no users to display

LNG_DIALOG_ALERT_MESSAGE_ANSWER_DATE_MIS.translation: Answer date missing for question answer

LNG_DIALOG_ALERT_MESSAGE_CONTACT_WITH_DU.translation: A contact with this first and last name already exists

LNG_DIALOG_ALERT_MESSAGE_CASE_WITH_DUPLI.translation: A case with this first and last name already exists

LNG_DIALOG_ALERT_MESSAGE_ARE_YOU_SURE_YO.translation: Are you sure you want to copy this date to all empty date fields ?

LNG_MOBILE_DIALOG_ALERT_MESSAGE_PERMISSI.translation: You don't have permissions for the following operation:

LNG_COMMON_LABEL_EXPORT_ERROR_NO_DATA.translation: There is no data to export
